keyword: how many calories in a hamburger and bun
title: How Many Calories in a Hamburger and Bun?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a hamburger and bun, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Hamburger and Bun?
assumptions: Standard 4-oz beef patty, grilled; white bun; basic toppings (lettuce, tomato, onion, ketchup, mustard); no cheese or mayo.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, patty size, bun type, toppings, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard hamburger with bun has about 250 kcal and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a basic hamburger and bun?
faqs.a: Approximately 250 kcal for a standard version with basic toppings.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a hamburger and bun?
faqs.a: About 15 g protein from the beef patty.

faqs.q: Does the bun add many carbs to a hamburger?
faqs.a: Yes, the bun contributes around 30 g carbs total.

faqs.q: How does adding mayo change calories in a hamburger and bun?
faqs.a: One tbsp mayo adds ~90 kcal, making it ~340 kcal total.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie options for a hamburger and bun?
faqs.a: Opt for a smaller patty, veggie toppings, or no bun to reduce to under 200 kcal.
